identity.title: (File input) Average salary from text file

content.prompt: Please complete the following method getAverageSalary in order to calculate the salary of a set of workers of a global company, whose information is contained in a text file formated in the following way:name1,country1,salary1name2,country2,salary2name3,country3,salary3...namen,countryn,salarynThe method receives a BufferedReader object as input, so you need to assume that the initialization of the BufferedReader object with a FileReader object was already done so you do not need to take care of it.Important: If the file is empty, please return 0.0 as the avg.Hint: you can use the method split() to separate each line in multiple fields.
